name: An empty string
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "An empty string" do
    expected = ""
    actual = reverseString.reverse ""
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: A word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "A word" do
    expected = "tobor"
    actual = reverseString.reverse "robot"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: A capitalized word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "A capitalized word" do
    expected = "nemaR"
    actual = reverseString.reverse "Ramen"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: A sentence with punctuation
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "A sentence with punctuation" do
    expected = "!yrgnuh m'I"
    actual = reverseString.reverse "I'm hungry!"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: A palindrome
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "A palindrome" do
    expected = "racecar"
    actual = reverseString.reverse "racecar"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: An even-sized word
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "An even-sized word" do
    expected = "reward"
    actual = reverseString.reverse "drawer"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: wide characters
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "wide characters" do
    expected = "猫子"
    actual = reverseString.reverse "子猫"
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
